Command.Name: FPLOCK
Command.Description: Permanent lock on lower Quarter region of the flash.

Command.Name: GETCAL
Command.Description: Flash Read Calibration Table to HOST

Parameter1.Name: Region Type 0 - Not valid 1 - RW 2 - Both

Command.Name: STACK_STATUS_GET
Command.Description: Get stack statuses of all threads

Command.Name: THERMLOOPINDXSET
Command.Description: Thermal loop updated parameter according to index

Command.Name: DIRTYBITBYPASS
Command.Description: Bypass eye safety dirty bit indication

Command.Name: DIRTYBITCLEAR
Command.Description: Clear eye safety dirty bit indication (tester only)

Command.Name: DIRTYBITGET
Command.Description: Get eye safety dirty bit indication 2B_FLASH/ 2B_EEPROM

Command.Name: THERMLOOPINDXGET
Command.Description: Thermal loop read parameter according to index

Parameter1.Name: Mode (0 for disable, 1 for dstOffsetOnly, 2 for enable)

Parameter2.Name: Update Frequency (times per seconds, 0 for disable)

Command.Name: OPER_COUNT_GET
Command.Description: Get eye safety operation counter (in minutes)

Command.Name: OPER_COUNT_SET
Command.Description: Set eye safety operation counter (in minutes) (tester only)

Command.Name: RF_GET
Command.Description: Read range finder statistics in chuncks

Command.Name: CT_KILL_THRESHOLDS_SET
Command.Description: Set CT KILL thresholds: LDD, MC, MA, APD (FF will set default threshold for the relevant thermistor)

Command.Name: REGS_LOCK_BYPASS_SET
Command.Description: Set regs lock bypass, Reset is required

Command.Name: PZR_POWER_AVG_GET
Command.Description: Get Average PZR vBias and iBias

Command.Name: ALGO_GNRL_CODE_SET
Command.Description: Set algo gen general code length

Command.Name: SET_PARAM_SYNC_LOOP
Command.Description: SET_PARAM_SYNC_LOOP param1: index Param param2: Value

Command.Name: GET_ALGO_THERMAL_LOOP
Command.Description: Get stack statuses of all threads
